MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Broad Lane, Winskill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:45PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:54PM on 23rd November 2020.
